SELECT USER_ID, BONUSSIGN FROM lunardetail WHERE EVALUATIONDAY = #{Years} AND `MONTH` = #{Types} GROUP BY USER_ID
SELECT USER_ID, LASTSYMBOL FROM lunardetail WHERE EVALUATIONDAY = #{Years} AND `MONTH` = #{Typess} GROUP BY USER_ID
